title-three: “Stamp & Win” - Experience the Innovative Dynamic Mixed Margin on BSC
title-frou: Time: From July 12th 10:00 AM to July 31st 10:00 AM UTC
less-bnb: Less BNB than the minimum requirement
use-a-new-address: Use a new address to participate, thanks!
rules-two: - Minimum BNB balance requirement: more than 0.2 BNB at July 12th, 02:00 AM UTC
rules-one: - This promotion does not apply to any addresses interacted with Deri Protocol before July 12th, 10:00 AM, 2021
rules-three: - Users who complete all the tasks will be eligible to win a share of the 100,000 USDT prize pool
step-one: Step 1: Click the 'STAMP' button three times. Notably, the 'STAMP' button can only be clicked once a day
step-two: Step 2: Approve your wallet on Deri Protocol when you have completed the 'STAMP'
step-three: Step 3: Click the 'CLAIM' button to get Deri Position token which includes a 1.5 BUSD Initial Margin, one BTCUSD smart contract, one ETHBUSD smart contract. Only the first 5,000 new addresses can claim the Ptoken
step-four: Step 4: Complete at least three trades on Deri Protocol
description: All users who complete the stamp will be eligible to win a share of the 100,000 USDT prize pool, while only the first 5,000 participants can claim Deri Ptoken
